Steps.Message: Update at 02:18 - Rob here from the messaging team again. I just wanted to let you know that the water board have now repaired the leak which caused the flood. Our staff are still draining the excess water from around our equipment, but this should be at a safe enough level for our staff to make repairs soon. I'm afraid I don't have an exact timeframe for power to be restored at the moment, but as soon as we have this information I'll let you know. I'll continue to keep you updated with all progress as it comes in from our staff, and as always our team are here on 08003163105 if you have any questions.

We became aware of a power cut at 18:49. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

Logs.Comment: Update at 02:18 - Rob here from the messaging team again. I just wanted to let you know that the water board have now repaired the leak which caused the flood. Our staff are still draining the excess water from around our equipment, but this should be at a safe enough level for our staff to make repairs soon. I'm afraid I don't have an exact timeframe for power to be restored at the moment, but as soon as we have this information I'll let you know. I'll continue to keep you updated with all progress as it comes in from our staff, and as always our team are here on 08003163105 if you have any questions.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We had to turn off power in your area so our engineers could safely carry out emergency repairs to the network.
